turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a couple of pizzas from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's do it. what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order two small glutton free pizzas, one cheese and one pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. 2 small gluten free crust pizzas, 1 cheese and 1 pepperoni comes out to $24.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.
